import math
T = int(raw_input())
while T>0:
    d = {}
    for i in range(26):
        d[chr(ord('a')+i)] = 0
        d[chr(ord('A')+i)] = 0
    S = raw_input()
    res = 0
    for i in S:
    	if i in d.keys():
        	d[i] += 1
    for i in d.keys():
        res += int(math.ceil(d[i]/2.0))
    print res
    T -= 1
